description: This creamy chicken dish is hearty and rich, and ticks all the boxes when it comes to comfort food.
keywords: Cheat's Honey Mustard Chicken Pasta Bake
name: Cheat's Honey Mustard Chicken Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 qty slow cooker honey mustard chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer pasta mixture to dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Grill for 4 minutes or until golden. Serve topped with parsley.
